ðŸ“– Summary: This repository provides a client-side, privacy-focused web application for removing backgrounds from images using machine learning models powered by Transformers.js. It offers one-click removal, custom background options, and local processing without server uploads, with optional WebGPU acceleration for enhanced performance.
